title: can someone lower my champion mastury points
body:
Hello uhhh
this might sound weird but could someone help me go to someone that can lower my mastery points on just 2 champs 
im not asking to have higher or anything i just want them to be lower 

thank {{sticker:sg-lulu}}

replies.body:
Your best bet would be to submit a ticket to player support: https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new

If anyone can help you it'd be them, but no guarantees.
